name: Super Soul Sword
description:
You are the big tough guy of destiny! Sent to the place by your father to vanquish some loser skeletons. Use your sword of destiny and your shield of uhh destiny to take out those bad dudes. Transform into a ghost and spook your way through 3 very short levels in order to fulfill the prophecy that was foretold by greg from IT.

Controls:

>>MOUSE + KEYBOARD<<

[W][A][S][D] = Up, Left, Down, Right
[SPACE] = Special
[MOUSE] = Aim
[LEFT MOUSE] = Attack
[RIGHT MOUSE] = TRANSFOOOOOORM!!!


>>GAMEPAD<<

Left Joystick = Movement/Aiming
[A] = Special
[X] = Attack
[B] = TRANSFOOOOOORM!!!
